text: Imagine you're at a concert, and the lead singer steps in front of the spotlight—suddenly, the guitarist is in shadow. That’s kind of how an eclipse works! When the Moon moves between the Earth and the Sun, it casts a shadow on us, turning day into twilight. Ever seen a flashlight blocked by your hand? That’s nature’s version—way cooler and way bigger!
